mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yt.c_orders (order_num, g_id, g_num, exchange_integration, state, o_date, address, consignee, consignee_tele, full_address, zip_code, tracking_num, openid)VALUES (#{order_num}, #{g_id}, #{g_num}, #{exchange_integration}, #{state}, #{o_date}, #{address}, #{consignee}, #{consignee_tele}, #{full_address}, #{zip_code}, #{tracking_num}, #{openid})
